Articles.Content:
i have no idea how to mod and i really want to spawn stuff in without going back to the sph/vab then teleporting the craft to a place then //repeat.

I have scoured the internet and found not a single one like this.

this could help alot in making cinematic videos that involve alot of crafts in one scene.

hyperedit is can help but really some people are too lazy to go back to the sph/vab just to spawn the exact same craft.

really useful feats in this

-draggable ghost of the craft before spawning in (like when removing a part of a craft in the assembly)

-a User-Friendly Menu

-a button in one of those toolbars up top of the screen to open the menu

-???

would be really cool if anyone made ~at least~ just the spawning part.

thanks in advance
Theres a mod called vessel mover it should work

https://github.com/PapaJoesSoup/VesselMover/releases

As used in all the top gun TKOL KOH  challenges and those  99% of BDAc  videos

Edited May 20, 2017 by SpannerMonkey(smce)
